content.detailedDescription: At 12:30am my boyfriend an i was sitting on our deck facing the flooded wabash river, when i noticed 2 objects that was hovering in the night sky. they was shaped like christmas trees. a triangle shape with a small square under it. they both had white lights. one of the objects was huge compared to the other one. the larger one was shining brightly. the smaller object's lights was pulsating an it's lights was a lot dimmer than the bigger one  i told my boyfriend, "that's not stars!" we watched them for 10 minutes and went back inside the cabin. a hour later we went back out and they were both gone. i've seen them before. they are just getting closer to my cabin because i can see their shapes more clearly. i've observed them moving in the past. they was moving at a snails pace. i just decided to report them this time because they are starting to freak me out.
content.summary: My boyfriend an i was sitting on our deck over looking the wabash river, when we observed the 2 objects.

content.detailedDescription: Bright unknown aircraft with blue, green, red lights going on and off near or on top of craft.
content.summary: Bright stationary unknown aircraft with blue, green, red lights going on and off near top of craft.

content.detailedDescription: My family had just finished a meal outside, when our two dogs began to bark furiously toward the west. (the back of the house where we could not see) i was the first to see a red orb of light come from behind our two story house. there was an apple orchard to the south of the house, at this time the dogs went silent. the light was about 500' away & visible to all witnesses. it then turned, & we could see that there where two lights, the other was white. then a beam of light came out between the two, who's size at that distance was about the size of basketballs, or slightly larger. the beam from between them swept up & down the isles of trees, as if searching for something. this went on for about four minutes, then too our surprise it just snapped up on us! it stayed there with this brilliant light pouring on us, illuminating the backyard like daylight for what seemed like a very long time. we were either too shocked to move, or something. i can remember seeing mostly everyone in that light, just standing stock still. until finally the light went out, like you would switch off a flashlight. the craft turned again, with the white orb going behind the red one, it was then i could see it was in the form of a perfect triangle. then it shot away at such a terrific speed, that had i blinked i'd have missed it's departing. again the dogs began to bark in the same direction as before. my step-father and my sister's husband gathered up the young ones, and ran into the house saying; "it was just an airplane!" my mother, sister, and i went to the other side of the house to see if we could see it again, under the protests of those already in the house, telling us we were crazy! but we went, out of shear curiosity. but saw nothing more that night. at no time was there a sound from the "craft" as it came to be known in the family. (at least those of us not in denial!) this is the first time i've spoken of it outside of those of us not there that night. my father has since passed, & my mother is getting on in years, & i thought that there should be some sort of record of things saw so long ago, of such extraordinary things!
content.summary: Ufo came from west, turned, two large lights observed by 5 adults, 2 children. single beam of light to ground, then swept between isles of orchard, then onto us. stayed for a time, turned again, then left towards west in blink of an eye!

content.detailedDescription: On may 17th 2015 while doing a brisk exercise walk around the area of the hondo airport i noticed the sun rays through the clouds. i stopped and took a photo of the clouds and sun rays. my daughter and wife were nearby jogging as well. after we were done we headed back to our truck which was parked about a half mile away from where i took the picture. i viewed my photo to show my family and noticed an object on the picture. i have an iphone 6+ so i was able to zoom in and noticed a diamond or manta ray shaped thing in the sky. this airport has hardly any air traffic and if there is it's usually a single prop either landing or taking off at least a few times a week. car traffic is almost zero as well. this area is a very quite airport except for an occasional train that passes but that is almost 3/4mile away. after we got home i loaded the picture on to my pc to view the object clearly. there was no airplane or aircraft flying nor was there any noise of one either. i never saw anything in the air when i took the picture.
content.summary: Diamond shaped object caught on my photo

content.detailedDescription: I saw a y shaped ufo on saturday, october 5, 2002 sometime before sundown. it was still daylight outside when i saw it. this was the first time i had ever seen a ufo. i was on linker rd. and was heading toward st. peter's ch. rd. on linker rd in the rural part of rockwell, nc (the east side of rowan county). as i got to the end of linker rd. i saw this y-shaped object twirling around in the sky above the tree line close in front of me. it was huge and i would have to say that it was way bigger than a football field. it had 4 big lights that were huge and really bright and all were the same size. and the rods that connected the lights looked to be some type of metallic metal and all were the same length. my windows were down and i heard no sound from it at all. i stopped not far from the end of linker rd. and watched it for a moment and then made a left onto st. peter's ch rd still watching it. i got up to the graveyard on the right and that's when it dove behind the trees in the far distance and did not come back up. i had no camera and no phone on me when i saw it. i have searched for this for years on the internet for this object and have never found much of anything that looks like it. i have found other photos of y-shaped crafts that others have seen but none of them look like this one. the only lights that were on this one were circular lights. i know i saw it during the day time, so maybe the metal beams light up and glow at night like some of the pictures on the internet i have seen that were taken at night. i can't be the only one that has seen this type of craft.
content.summary: Y shaped ufo spotted oct 5, 2002 in rockwell, nc rowan county on linker rd.

content.detailedDescription:
I am 43. up to my mid 20's i had what i think where abductions that typically happened during sleep. 

my entire life i have had issues falling asleep and always feel tired even when i get a lot of sleep. when the "abductions" happened, the next morning i felt i had the kind of sleep i only dream of and woke up refreshed and happy. 

the experiences seemed like lucid dreams where i ended up on a craft, traveled around the our earth and other places in the universe. the et's were friendly. i believe these events were a knowledge transference or dump as i remember the et's educating me during the abductions but unfortunately i never remembered the information they gave me. i wish there was a way to find out the info they gave me. sometimes items in my room would be moved int my closet. this moving of object happened even when i did not remember an "abduction".

these experiences happened many times from the time i was born until my mid 20's. in my 20's i had a number of what i;d describe as "outer body" experiences, some during sleep some awake, and some correlating with events that happened the following day.  

i am sensitive to light. i can read people very well. i feel like i receive data dumps regularly. i also feel like i am tapped into the akashic records. animals and i have a strong connection, more so than people. 

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 
      home, sacramento/davis/berkeley/st. helena california. sleeping, dancing.
2. what made you first notice the object?
3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
      peace, happiness, acceptance, sharing of knowledge. i embraced the experience, did not feel a reason not to. 
6. how did you lose sight of the object?

i'd like to find out exactly what happened, what information was given to me, and anything else i can find out.
content.summary: Multiple possible abductions through half my life.

content.detailedDescription: I was grilling when i saw a circular orb moving around the tree tops about a mile away. i happened to have such low battery on my cell phone that it wouldn't allow me to take a picture or video. i didn't want to go inside because i was afraid with my luck the object would disappear before i got out a camera. so with the small percentage of battery left on my phone, i made a last second call to my neighbor to come out quickly. she did, and for about ten minutes we both saw this object moved with no apparent flight plan. it hovered around changing from what looked like white red green and blue colors. it kind of looked liked the orb of the good witch of the wizard of oz. it never got closer or further. it would move diagonally then in a semi circle, then just vertically or horizontally. it finally dipped under the treetop line and thats when i decided to leave my grill and walk closer to where i had seen the object. by then it was gone and i never saw it again. we told her husband who thought we were nuts. i figured in this day in age it was probably a drone. i had forgot about it until a few weeks later i remembered the incident and decided to look it up online. it just so happened some guy who was driving that night, saw the object too, and decided to pull over and video tape the object. it is on youtube still and it was the same object i saw but my neighbor and i were a lot closer to the object then the video. just look up ufo in tamarac on youtube
content.summary: Orb changing colors looked like movement of orb of the good witch of  the wizard of oz

content.detailedDescription: I was at funland riding a ferris wheel and all of a sudden my mom and i saw a red and orange glowing fireball type object in the sky. at first i thought that it was a chinese lantern and it was going straight inland. i just saw it for a second so i was not worried about it. the next day at our campground which was about 10 miles away, i told my friend what i saw and he immediately said that he saw the same object that same night with about 10 other people. immediately i said to myself, "i just saw a ufo".
content.summary: Red  orange fireball like object in the sky with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the driveway at a friend's house after a group meeting. two friends and we were talking. i noticed a bright gold light with rays shoot across the eastern sky in a diagonal line from northeast to southeast. it was very, very fast. it was different than a shooting star.

i have never taken pictures of anything in the sky before, but that night i felt compelled to get out my phone and take pictures. i got my phone out very quickly and pointed to the sky and took 3 pictures. i did not see anything when i took the pictures. i thought it was a ufo. i lost sight of the object when it went below the tree line.
content.summary: Object with golden rays shot across sky in a diagonal line very, very quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
I was born in may, 1951. my brother is 18 months younger;  my sister 5 years younger. we lived on a dead end street. no one some of these things until in was in my 20's. my sister thought it was a dream that terrified her. my brother just mentioned it last week while watching hanger 1. 
i have no memory of leaving my bedroom, which was upstairs. i think i was 7 or 8. i would wake up in the empty field beside our house. sometimes i was alone, sometimes my sister was with me. on one occasion, and there were many, i was alone in the field, looking up at all these objects in the sky. they were of various shapes and sizes. they made humming or low frequency buzzing noises. it seemed the only one that terrified me was the upside down cone: it was a dull whiteish color but it had a black dot at the tip that swirled upwards as it floated in the air. it scared me badly...I thought it was bad.
i wanted to run away from it, but couldn't move as if literally frozen with fear. i would wake up the next mornings, still feeling the fear, but didn't talk about it. 
another time, the pixies would come and get me. they would be with me in my room, but then we'd be someplace else. it seemed i would be in my elementary school, and they were floating outside the building. i could see them wanting me to float with them, but i was running down the school steps to get away from them. i thought it was a game.
one time the policies came and took me someplace different. i was never afraid of the policies. they were short, like me, and they were always smiling. the didn't have any hair, but that was okay because they were dixies. 
anyway, this time they took me to a big, silvery white room with other people standing around...But not people. i don't remember what they did, but two of the policies holding my hands were saying..."don't be afraid little girl. don't be afraid."
the next tim i woke up, i was in a circular type room where these cold silver slabs came out from the walls for beds. 
i woke up, naked with a sheet blanket covering me from my neck to my knees. i couldn't move really well. i turned to look to my left and there was an adult man, who was asleep with the same type of blanket on him.
toward the bend of the room, which had subdued lighting around the rim at the top of the room, i heard a swish sound. as i was coming more awake, i started to sit up. at the door was this insect-reptilian type thing with its arms crossed, smearing at me. suddenly the two policies came in, laid me down took my hands and were telling me not to be afraid. they always called me little girl.
one of the scariest was when they had taken both my sister and myself. there were the usual ships in the air, including that cone, which terrified my sister more than it did me. 
suddenly there was a very tall man dressed in a long white robe. the others seemed afraid of him. although he stood back a few feet, he told me to get my sister to the little walnut tree which was in our yard. he said if we would stand with our arms around it, one on each side, and hug each other tight, staying under the branches of the tree, we'd be safe and they couldn't take us. my sister will not talk about this to this day. 
just last week out of the blue, my brother asked me if i remembered those things that came in the field while we were outside playing and we would run inside crying, because we were afraid. strangely, he remembers the daytime encounters while i do not.
the ones i remember all took place at night. 
for the past several years, i've always known when they were coming. i don't know how often they've managed to get me. i can tell you that i wake up fighting and kicking them.  the last i remember was two years ago. 
since i fell, two and a half years ago, i can sometimes feel them around but i don't think they're taking me.
for years i tried to sketch that thing in the doorway of that room. finally a  year ago, i was able to draw it, and the room. i have felt better since then.
i have had prerogative dreams since my early teens. sometimes as i'm going to sleep i can see my room as if my eyes are open even though i know they're closed. i know things about people that i have no business knowing. 
i've explained things as best as i'm able. 
it's not easy, and sometimes i still feel the anxiety. 
oh, and...Lights in the sky still make me afraid until i can figure out what it is. 
thanks for reading this. i don't know what you may make of it, but, there it is. 
one more thing, i other abductees seem drawn to me without knowing whyet i always know.  
if i can answer any questions, just ask. 
thanks
content.summary: Various crafts at different sizes and shapes for different purposes

content.detailedDescription: I was on my porch facing north when i saw a large bright deep orange round object low in the sky and traveling faster than most planes. it was about 10:40 pm and there was no noise noted. i have seen this two times before, but this time it was much larger, and traveling faster. this object traveled  north to north west, and instead of stopping mid-air , then blinking out, then back on again, continued in a semi-circular path until i couldn't  see it anymore. i went inside to grab my camera just in case, and within 10-15 seconds isaw it again! i took pictures, but my camera stinks, and it was hard to see in the "lens". i remained outside, and then it returned! i took more photo's and yelled to my daughter to ready the video on her iphone. after this one was out of view, i ran in the house to grab her phone, and when i returned, so did the object! i also tried to video on my camera, but you computer died , so not sure if i captured it or not. surprisingly enough it happened one more time, five in all! all were identical in size, shape , color, and route. i thought perhaps it was these eons circling, but never saw it past the samenwdirection!I live on the coast where it would've/shoul'vebeen visible, but it was not. i also took pics/video of planes in the area at the same time for comparison. was excited, especially since was third sighting since nov. 2014, but very curious to know what exactly it was! did anyone wiewsame?
content.summary: five orange circular objects flew overhead in same path over 5 minute or  so

content.detailedDescription: Dogs started, the  barking went outside patio the objects no sound and flight formation,constant velocity kept in flight formation
content.summary: 2 ufos in flight formation

content.detailedDescription: I arrived in my laneway (farmhouse) at 9 am and when i drove down the laneway towards the house, i saw two large ships hovering over the tree tops at the back of my house where the forest is.  i thought at first they were helicopters searching for someone but when i got out of the car, there was no noise and they were extremely large and almost looked like an apartment building due to all the  lights.  there were two.  no one was home and i could not find my house keys due to the fact i had changed purses and went to the garage to obtain my spare key so i could get my camera but i guess my daughter had taken it, as usual.  my husband was at a hockey game with our son and would not be home until 11 pm and there was no way i was sticking around because i was very frighten.  i took my cell and took a picture but all i could see were the lights and circles on the camera.  i still have the cell but don't know how good the photo is. all i can say is i got out of there as fast as i could due to the fact i was frightened and went to visit a friend as i was very shaken up until my husband came home.  i got home after eleven and was still pretty shaken up but it was gone by then, thank goodness.
content.summary: Arrived in my laneway and looked up and saw lights hovering in the back of my house.  thought they were helicopters in search for someone but when i got out of my car, no noice whatsover and they were huge.

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home from northern bc between quesnel and williams lake on highway 97, i spotted a craft that i initially thought to be a huge kite and pointed it out to my wife. the highway traveld in a southerly direction and the craft seemed to be paralleling the highway and the fraser river, the river being approx. 1/2 mile to our west. as we drove along, the object was traveling nearly at our speed of 60 mph and seemed to be across the river another mile or more. we had a very good view of the object and there was a trailing apparatus below the craft and it appeared to be of a very heavy chain or cable with a little larger object at its trailing end. that is what made me first think of a kite, but it wasn't stationary. the trailing cable was at about a 35 degree angle from the bottom of the craft.
at a convienient pullout with a clear view of the craft i pulled over and took out my binoculars for a quick look and my camera, a kodak easyshare z950 and zoomed in on the object for a photo, but it wouldn't seem to focus clearly on it, kept going in and out of focus. it seemed to be somewhat transparent through the viewfinder and with the binoculars, but was clearer with the naked eye. the trailing tail looked to be at least two hundred feet or more in length and i now suspected the object at its end was an apparatus that may have been collecting data, for i was now positive it was not a canadian aircraft of any sort i have seen. i am a professional land surveyor with over 45 years of experience, and observations are most relvant to that occupation. the photo 1 has some nearby pine trees above the craft, a triangular shape with a deffinate protrussion at the top and bottom of its rear end and a long, elogated additional wing, if i may, at the bottom of the craft from near the front tapering toward the rear. there was a bit of a haze look across the valley, but when i first saw the object it appeared much clearer than the photo and was below the main cloud cover. one lower cloud can be seen somewhat , in front of the object. 
i got back in the car and traveled on southward and thought if i sped up some i could get a little closer and get another photo. but as i sped up, so did the object and the long heavy trailing cable was now at a 50 degree angle, proving it had speeded up also. i stopped and got the photo 2 at a further distance away, but it doesn't show a great deal other than its semi transparency. that tree line on the horizon appeared to me to be two to three miles away and the object appeared to be even further. the tallest trees on that horizon are probably not over 100 ft. in height, which gives the impression that this craft is very large.
i kept up my speed as some lower mountains i would enter would obstruct the view and hoped to see the object again as i neared the top of the hill trending down into williams lake, but the craft was never seen again. i'm certain other southbound drivers saw this same object, but i've not run across any other report. perhaps you have.
content.summary: Unknown flying machine unlike any other, appearing huge in size

content.detailedDescription: Llegaba a casa del trabajo a las 4:00 p.M. en el parqueadero del edificio, me encontraba con mi esposa y el vigilante, notamos los objeto porque hicimos el comentario de que había mucho sol y que la luna estaba, cuando buscamos la luna en el cielo, notamos que en dirección del sol, habían dos objetos muy brillantes. en un principio parecían dos estrellas muy brillantes, pero, cuando los detallamos, tenía movimientos, uno de ellos oscilaba como un trompo, la intensidad de la luz cambiaba, se movía y se detenía. el otro desapareció. luego, con la foto, nos dimos cuenta que este era de forma triangular. nos sorprendimos y tomamos una foto con el teléfono celular, no tomamos más fotos, porque como era en la dirección al sol no pensamos que fueran a salir bien, era emocionante, luego de unos minutos el que tenía forma de esfera empieza a moverse y se desaparece lentamente hacia el norte.
content.summary: It was two objects . one was a very bright ball and the other was a bright triangular object.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was taking pictures of his land. when we printed the pictures we saw the object. he didnt even see it or hear it he thought it was a tower. upon closer observation of the picture and blowing it up we noticed the shape and that it is not in the pictures before or after.
content.summary: Taking pictures of land and saw the object over the bush

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my yard east side of house, it was a clear night. a bright light caught my eye. i only had to adjust my line of sight up slightly. there was a bright white light for a second, out of which came a beautiful lime green laser like beam. the green light was slightly angled down. when the green light came out it grew slowly (several seconds), not instantly like a beam of light should. it seemed like there was a bluish white light underneath green light, but i can't be sure. when light went out it was gone instantly. i stayed out for another hour or so and never seen or heard anything else.
content.summary: Lime green light beam

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to a friends house at approx. 2 pm. it was a very hot day. i was walking up the"trail" which were old train tracks many years ago. i was walking from bancroft, ontario to bird's creek which was just north of there.After that was a big blank. the next thing i remember was that i was in the middle of a huge swamp. it smelled very bad. i tried to stand up but i started to sink in was i guessed was quicksand. i was terrified because it was almost dark out so i figured that it must have been at least 9:30 or 10:00 pm. i decided that i would lie on my stomach and pull myself out by the reeds that were growing in the swamp. it must have taken me at least an hour to get the the shore. after that was dense woods. i had no idea where i was. i heard a car far off in the distance. i headed that way.From there was solid brush and woods. i panicked and screamed a few times.But i knew i had to keep going towards the car sound. it took hours but i finally came out to the highway. exhausted and scraped and bruised, i found my way to my friends house. by then it was close to midnight. she was shocked at the sight of me. i was scratched up very severely and had a rash all over my body. i was filthy and smelly from the swamp. i showered and changed clothes. she gave me calamine lotion to put on the rash. she asked what happened and of coarse i couldn't say because i had no idea. a lot of missing time and no explanation of how i only came to when i hit the water. i know that the only explanation was that i was dropped directly in the middle of the swamp. but how? this has haunted me for 15 years and i still have no memories of what happened in those missing hours. and ps i developed severe tinnitus about one year later. i still have it today. the high-pitched frequencies that are in both of my ears never stops. and i mean never.Thankyou for reading this. i haven't told very many people because, well you know they wouldn't believe me.
content.summary: I believe i was abducted. 7 hour loss of time and memory.

content.detailedDescription: So it was 4th of july weekend me and my bro were camping out back i woke up to go to the restroom about 12 at night i looked up i saw a flat black triangle with whit and blue exsteroir lights i wached this for about 10 to 18 minutes the it decended to the tree line then into the forest and i made a break for the house to use the restroom when i came out the ufo or whatever it was was back in the air then it dashed of i was frighteng i grabed my bro we sleeped very littel that night inside
content.summary: It hovered then disipered and rose again and dashed off

content.detailedDescription:
June 30, 2015

this is an historical report of a structured craft of the “black triangle” sort.

it was observed in the late fall of 1976.
lighting conditions:   approaching dusk, but not yet dark enough to see stars.
weather:  c a v u,  no cloud cover.
optics used:  7 x 50 nikon binoculars, and naked eye.
distance to object:  as close as 100 - 125 feet.
number of observers:  two
observer ages:  28 and 30 years of age at the time.   67 and 69 now.
relationship of observers:  married 9 years then, 48 years now.
occupations:  a middle school teacher, and an electrical designer / draftsman.
prior ufo observations:  none        
subsequent ufo observations:  none
previous interest in ufo’s:   not much.   
 physiological after-effects:    none.

observation events and timeline:
on the observation maps, the craft path is marked in red, and the observers’ path is in blue.
note: these google earth images were made some 39 years after the observation.  most of the commercial and residential development seen in these photos did not exist at the time.  the homes on the brownwood peninsula were destroyed by hurricane alicia in 1983.   brownwood is now deserted, with only nature trails and a wildlife habitat.

•	we walked out to the mailbox together.  we noticed the craft when it directly overflew us at an altitude of 100-125 feet, moving generally north very slowly, probably less than 10 miles per hour.  (see map – ufo noticed)    there was a slight sound, like exhaling gently through pursed lips.  (not a whistle, just a sound of air in motion).  
•	we immediately jumped in the 4wd pickup, and began to follow the craft northward, across the brownwood peninsula subdivision.
•	the craft crossed the shoreline at the south end of burnet bay.  it proceeded about 75-100 yards offshore, turned slightly eastward, and stopped. (see map - observation 2)
•	the craft remained stationary for about ten minutes, slightly “bobbling” as if floating. it did not change heading or altitude. our viewpoint was from the right-rear of the craft.  we both exited our truck and observed it through 7 x 50 binoculars.  we had no camera.
•	we remained there until the craft started moving northward across burnet bay, then we gave chase again.   we drove to bayway drive and turned north.   decker drive, (now spur 330) was under construction.  there was a huge mound of dirt for an overpass foundation.  i drove my 4wd up on top of the mound.  (see map – observation 3)
•	we observed the craft cross the decker drive right-of-way about ¾ mile west of us, still at very low altitude, moving less than ten miles per hour.
•	we spun the truck around and went down the dirt mound, back onto bayway drive, and turned north.   the street name changes from bayway drive to thompson road as it crosses cedar bayou – lynchburg road.    
•	moving north on thompson road, just before passing under interstate 10, we observed the craft moving northward, about ½ mile west of us, still very low and slow.                 (see map – observation 4)
•	we raced north on thompson road to get ahead of the craft, then turned west onto jones road.  we saw the craft coming, and stopped directly in its path.   
•	the craft directly overflew us at an altitude of 100-125 feet, about three times as high as the telephone poles.   it was not yet dark, but i turned on my truck spotlight, and directed the beam onto the bottom of the craft, more to elicit some sort of response, rather than to see with.  (see map – observation 5)
•	in the bright light, we both observed centerline bay doors on the bottom of the craft.  possibly for landing gear or weapons.    (see drawing for details)
•	after the overflight, the craft banked slightly, turning more toward the east.  we turned around, and raced back to thompson road.  we turned north, and raced to east houston street, and proceeded to the dead end.  (see map – observation 6)    
•	there we observed the craft cross the south shoreline of the highlands reservoir, and proceed northeast out of sight beyond the levee.    (see map – ufo vanished)   
•	we lost sight of the craft, and had no path to get ahead of it, so we returned home.  

end of observation.
duration: approximately 45 minutes.  

post observation discussion and retrospection:
we could not come up with an apt term to describe the color of the craft’s marker lights.  there were three dim lights, one at each corner of the triangular shape, about as bright as 25 watt bulbs.   the color was “pinkish-orange”.   there were no other lights at any time.  the “marker” lights remained lighted during the entire observation.  the lights were integral with the craft, and not “attached” to it.

the plan shape was an isosceles triangle, about 40 feet wide, and 80 feet long.
the cross section was a flattened diamond shape.  the rear was 40 feet wide, and 10 feet high at the middle.  this shape tapered to a point at the front end.  the external surfaces were planar, with no curved surfaces on the outside.  all edges appeared to be sharp.

there was no discernable cockpit or control point.   there were possibly grilled openings at the rear of the craft.   there were at least two centerline bays along the bottom of the craft.   we observed no windows, camera ports, antennas, external attachment points etc. we observed no numbers or other markings on the craft.

due to our relative positions, we could not observe the top aspect of the craft.   when viewed from the side, we were too far away to see any detail.

the craft was flat black, with the appearance of the “ironball” paint used on the sr-71.
the thought came to mind:   “lockheed skunkworks – kelly johnson”.

observers’ impression:   
we saw a us military stealth intruder craft being tested.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black triangle craft, 100-150' altitude, moving slow. i followed it 5 or 6 miles.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the car, looking out the window, and i saw a small black craft hovering in sight of the car. i was looking at it from an angle that gave me a good view of both the top, the side, and the bottom the craft. it appeared to be at an altitude of at least a few hundred feet, and it did not move in any way. it was shaped like saturn, with an edge that protruded out of the side of the ufo. the bottom of the ufo was dome-shaped, and the top of the ufo appeared to be a larger dome. it appeared to be a small black circle-shaped flying saucer, with red blinking lights on the edge of the ufo; the red lights blinked about three times per second, and it appeared that there were about seven lights. it looked like there was a line of large bolts running down the the middle of the craft.

about three seconds after first seeing the ufo, i looked through the opposite car window to see if there were any other crafts accompanying the ufo. after looking through the other window for about two seconds, i realized that there were no accompanying ufos, and i looked back. it was gone, and it left no trail or sign of its presence. because i was looking the other way, i did not know how quickly it left, nor how long it stayed there. 

i did not realize the ufo was there at first, and i don't know if it had just arrived there to hover. my entire sighting, lasting from first seeing the ufo to realizing it was gone, lasted about five seconds.
content.summary: A small black circular craft hovered in the sky for a few seconds, and then disapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Went to an outdoor bbq in whitehall, michigan with friends. it was dark out probably 10 or 11 p.M. the sky was full of stars. it was cool i had never seen so many stars at one time. beautiful. girlfriend liz and i were sitting on the picnic table just looking all over the sky when a red orb slowly come into our direct field of vision in the west. it hovered as another red orb came from the east and it hovered too. as those two lined up with each other a third red orb showed a bit above the first two as if from the north. the farther orb met with the second one and looked like they became one and they met with the third and they were all one. 2 seconds after that it went off just shot off and was gone. i said "liz did you just see what i saw?" she said yes. we were both kind of dumbfounded. what the heck was that. no one else was looking up so we are the only ones that noticed them. i know it wasn't any fireworks. no one was lighting any at the time. the orbs were farther up than any firework i have seen. there were no trails behind them. no kind of a heat wave around them. just solid red orbs. i was 26 27 at the time. i am now 55 and it seems like it was yesterday. we sat there and observed these for only maybe 45 seconds and were awe struck. i whole heartedly feel we saw ufos. never seen anything like it before. i've been watching the hangar 1 videos and there is a video with the electric and plasma universe or something like that. anyways the way magnet fields work it was sort of like that when they converge and became one. kind of eerie not knowing what was up there. i feel better i told someone who might truly understand this. i still keep an eye in the sky and more so because i live 1 mile away from south bend international airport. lots of low flying over me. i only wish i had video or at least a photo. awesome experience! sorry this appeared to take place out over lake michigan.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 red orbs appear in sky at different spaces. one lined up and a second lined up and they 1 by 1 converge to the 3 orb

content.detailedDescription:
I all i want to report is four events (late 60s-early 70s) witnessed by my parents, an aunt and 2 uncles. their reactions were really frustrating to me. very logical, no-nonsense people in their 50-60s.
grandpa was stern, german, and a lutheran minister, so maybe that explains their attitude.

parents - 1970s back road waupaca county near clintonville, wi - mom described an orange, glowing cigar-shaped ship moved silently above high tension wires. saw people in windows of vehicle. mom was very nonchalant, very hard to get any details. puzzling...

aunt and uncle - same relative area as above, near a blueberry marsh, saucer-shaped object with red and green flashing lights on edge, was hovering over a field between the road and woods beyond. aunt scared, dog barking, uncle got out of car, while screaming at him to leave. uncle said it sounded like a number of piper cub engines. after hovering for a few minutes, it flashed a beam of light on the ground, then shut off, rose about fifty feet, and shot off over the trees. went back the next day and saw a slightly-singed circle in the dry, mown grass.

two uncles - fishing predawn on shawano lake, shawano county, large lake at the eastern edge of the town of shawano, wi. they saw a formation of circular lights moving silently over the lake, from east to west. i seem to remember uncle saying there were about 7-8 of them. 

parents - eau claire, wi, east of twin cities, mn. babysitting for their niece and nephews, were heading to airport to pick up the parents about 10 pm. saw a large light hovering in sky over a suburban area of city, on a hillside. dad stopped the car, and folks got out to get a better look. some people in the houses near by came out to observe also. light simply drifted off, away from town. again, no sound.

you probably don't want to bother with skimpy info like this, but just wanted to tell someone about the events i heard about in my youth.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Conversation at small family gathering, during a spate of sightings in wi. all deceased.

content.detailedDescription:
Worked shifts at nasa goddard for rca (satellite controller) in 1970's. went fishing  in my small 12 ft. rowboat at t. howard duckett watershed in howard county maryland. was anchored in middle of patuxent river when a flash of reflected light caught my eye. looked up to ne and observed a thin, cigar-shaped craft, about 100 ft. long, at about 1,000 ft. altitude moving rapidly to sw. craft stopped directly in my northern field of view and hovered briefly at an azimuth of about 40 degrees. it was a mile, or less, away and made no sound. craft traveled at about 500 mph in both directions. although confused i continued fishing. no physical or mental distress or concerns. it seemed to disappear in ne as it flew into sun.

i am a retired contractor. worked for rca, ge and computer sciences corp., during my 35 years in u.S. satellite operations and computer center programs.
worked on nasa space tracking and data neytwork, gemini, apollo, goes weather satellites, hubble space telescope, earth observing satellites and consulting to nasa's chief engineer at nasa headquarters in washington, d.C. in my last year before retiring.

didn't get too excited because i had management positions of responsibilty and credibility to worry about. now that i'm retired.......
content.summary: Cigar shape, approx. 100ft.  long, bright white, reflected sunlight, seen over water on clear day, traveled ne to sw, stopped, hovered , abruptly reversed back to n e.

content.detailedDescription: When i was bout 9 or 10 yrs old.I seen a saucerlike ufo behind my home in whitbourne nfld.It was just hovering there.I remember getting my mom and dad and my mom took apicture.Im not sure if she staill has it.The ufo took off after bout 20 mins and went straight up into the sky nd disappeared,none of us were sure what we had seen but when the film was developed and we seen we got the picture than it became very real.I actually cant remember too much more about that day.Iv struggled for years to remember the days events up to and after the ufo sighting but still don't have amemory.I do recall going back  to the area over the years to try and see it again but never did.Im 50 yrrs old now and wish i knew what we all saw that summer evening.
content.summary: Ii was nine or ten when i seen the object over the hill behind my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my bed watching tv.
i just had a feeling that i should look out the window in that direction.
it just appeared out of nowhere and suddenly disappeared.
at first i thought it was a shooting star but i've seen shooting stars before and they've never been anything like that. also, the object was under the clouds.
it only appeared for a second but it was a white object which left a green trail behind it. for the second that it appeared, it was moving at extreme speed, it appeared as quickly as it disappeared.
before i was calm, beginning of my holiday from work. 
reaction was what the hell did i just see! i've always believe in alien life and that people do see ufos but i never thought i'd see one.
my first thought was to write down everything that i witnessed, the direction the object traveled in, the time so i am able to remember everything after.
it just disappeared.
content.summary: Circle object, white light, green cone trail, witnessed for less than a second

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed aboard uss bon homme richard cva31 at bremerton, wa august 1960. ten or more of us sailors were on the fantail gazing at the stars. it was a christle clear night. all of us were shocked to see what we thought was a star move straight down for maybe two minutes. it then made a 90 degree turn to the left and went the same distance and time and stopped for maybe a minute. it then headed straight back to point "a" and then disappeared. all of us talked about what we saw for quite a while. i don't remember who went to the quarterdeck to tell the officer of the deck what we all saw. nor have i seen any of the other sailors who were there since then. it has been a long time. i have told this to quite a few people, but never thought to contact you professionals before i saw your tv show yesterday. i have always believed in life in outer space, just as i believe visitors have been to our earth for centuries. i also believe all of the world governments have covered up their knowledge of other world visitors.
content.summary: It looked like a star that could move in a straight line and turn at a 90 degree angle

content.detailedDescription: I was 6-8 years old. my sister and i were out walking through manzanita groves looking for snakes. i spotted a white object that was slowly flying over. i pointed it out to my sister and we watched. it was only a few hundred feet up. i was scarred but it was if i couldn't move. it was white almost like a rocket ship that the us had been sending into space. it had markings on it but not in anything i have ever seen. it never stopped, just flew over slowly making no sound. after it disappeared we ran back up to the house and tried to explain it to our grandmother. she just discounted us and thought we had made up the story. my sister and i never spoke about this again.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object that slowly flew over

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my girlfriend s cottage in bancroft on.It was about 11 o'clock pm we left late to avoid traffic,  i was on hwy 28 traveling south west near peterborough there was this light that was so anoying because it was so bright i thought someone was arc welding on a tower then the light went out suddenly and i leaned forward and looked up to see what that bright light was and there was no sky just what looked like a giant disco dance floor it was so huge and my mind couldn't understand what i was looking at i kept driving and in the rear view mirror i saw that bright light come back on i never really thought about ufos before this happened this has changed my life.
content.summary: Was traveling southwest home from bancroft on.  on hwy 28 there was a light i thought was arc. welding on a tv tower but the light went out it had several pastel coloured lights i drove underneath it my son saw it to i was following my girlfriend.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home  west to east on rt 40 when i saw what i thought was a plane moving away from me but i was catching up to it then i past under it  a orange/red ball of light  drove past it. got about 400 yards away and pulled off the road and watched it, when 1 would vanish into the clouds the next would show up above the tree line to the north of  rt 40 fallowing the same flight path as the first they moved into the wind from north to sw i took pics of 5 20 pics tot with my i phone. weather cloudy night
content.summary: At first i thought plane but i realized it was to low and i soon past under the first orb
